price: ߍ߲߬ߍ߲߫ ( ߌ ߞߴߏ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߘߋ߬ )߸ ߌ ߦߋ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߓߊ߬ߕߏ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߥߊߟߢߌߡߊߟߐ߲ߠߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: bali al-laha fa-uʿ'bud wakun mina al-shākirīna
